lighthouseConsole.title: Lighthouse Console
lighthouseConsole.description:
Oyasumi needs to know about the location of your SteamVR installation's lighthouse_console.exe.
If Oyasumi cannot find it in the default location, you need to set where it can be found.

status.NOT_FOUND: The lighthouse_console.exe could not be found at this location.
status.INVALID_EXECUTABLE: The lighthouse_console.exe at this location could not be verified as working.
status.PERMISSION_DENIED: Oyasumi does not have permission to run the lighthouse_console.exe at this location. Try running Oyasumi as administrator.
status.INVALID_FILENAME: The set location is not a valid file path.
status.UNKNOWN_ERROR: An unknown error occurred while trying to look for lighthouse_console.exe at this location.
status.SUCCESS: lighthouse_console.exe has been found and is working correctly!
